explanation: Funds are required for a classified requirement with additional information provided at a higher classification. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
